How It Works

What is a Remix Tree? â–¼

A remix tree visualizes the genealogy of Scratch projects. When someone remixes a project, they create a branch in the tree. This tool reconstructs these relationships to show how creativity spreads through the Scratch community.

Scratch removed this feature in mid-October 2024, so this tool brings it back using the official Scratch API.
